title: Chic and just walking distance from vibrant restaurants and shops
posting_body: 3 bed + 3 bath unit located on the 3rd floor, with a dual-access balcony off of the living room, and wood flooring throughout.
Stainless steel appliances in the open kitchen, lots of natural light, and in-unit washer/dryer make for comfortable living.
Unit comes with parking for 2 vehicles, and property has a rooftop lounge.
To request a showing please reply with the date and time you would like to see the unit and the best number / email to contact you so we can confirm the appointment.
Culver City ,  Mar Vista, Palms , West adams, Marina del Rey, lofts for lease, lofts for rent, LAMR
